results.title: Metformin attenuates white matter injury and cognitive impairment induced by chronic cerebral hypoperfusion.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ attenuates @DISEASE_Leukoencephalopathies @DISEASE_MESH:D056784 @@@white matter injury@@@ and @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@ induced by chronic @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Palsy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002547 @@@cerebral hypoperfusion@@@.

citations.NLM: He Y, Li Z, Shi X, Ding J, Wang X. Metformin attenuates white matter injury and cognitive impairment induced by chronic cerebral hypoperfusion. J Cereb Blood Flow Metab. 2023 May 12;():271678X231175189. PMID: 37177813

results.title: Metformin, Rapamycin, or Nicotinamide Mononucleotide Pretreatment Attenuate Cognitive Impairment After Cerebral Hypoperfusion by Inhibiting Microglial Phagocytosis
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@Rapamycin@@@, or @CHEMICAL_Nicotinamide_Mononucleotide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009537 @@@Nicotinamide Mononucleotide@@@ Pretreatment Attenuate @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@Cognitive Impairment@@@ After @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Palsy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002547 @@@Cerebral Hypoperfusion@@@ by Inhibiting Microglial Phagocytosis

citations.NLM: Yu M, Zheng X, Cheng F, Shao B, Zhuge Q, Jin K. Metformin, Rapamycin, or Nicotinamide Mononucleotide Pretreatment Attenuate Cognitive Impairment After Cerebral Hypoperfusion by Inhibiting Microglial Phagocytosis Front Neurol. 2022;13():903565. PMID: 35769369

results.title: Therapeutic Effects of Metformin on Central Nervous System Diseases: A Focus on Protection of Neurovascular Unit.
results.text_hl: This review focuses on @DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@retinal (diabetic retinopathy@@@, @DISEASE_Retinitis_Pigmentosa @DISEASE_MESH:D012174 @@@retinitis pigmentosa@@@) and @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Palsy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002547 @@@cerebral (@@@@DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischemic stroke@@@, @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease) diseases@@@ to explore the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the NVU.

citations.NLM: Cai C, Gu C, Meng C, He S, Thashi L, Deji D, Zheng Z, Qiu Q. Therapeutic Effects of Metformin on Central Nervous System Diseases: A Focus on Protection of Neurovascular Unit. Pharm Res. 2024 Oct 7;():. PMID: 39375240

results.title: Acute Administration of Metformin Protects Against Neuronal Apoptosis Induced by Cerebral Ischemia-Reperfusion Injury via Regulation of the AMPK/CREB/BDNF Pathway
results.text_hl: In summary, our results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ upregulates the level of @GENE_BDNF @GENE_627 @@@BDNF@@@ in the @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Palsy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002547 @@@cerebral ischemic penumbra@@@ via the @GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMPK@@@/@GENE_CREB1 @GENE_1385 @@@CREB@@@ pathway, thereby playing a protective effect in @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@cerebral I/R injury@@@.

citations.NLM: Liu K, Li L, Liu Z, Li G, Wu Y, Jiang X, Wang M, Chang Y, Jiang T, Luo J, Zhu J, Li H, Wang Y. Acute Administration of Metformin Protects Against Neuronal Apoptosis Induced by Cerebral Ischemia-Reperfusion Injury via Regulation of the AMPK/CREB/BDNF Pathway Front Pharmacol. 2022;13():832611. PMID: 35431946
